Late Summer Trip To India

Location

Dates

03-08-2025 - 16-08-2025

Description

This is the trip, we were waiting for, in a short two weeks, we  will go through two south indian states of Kerala and Karnataka, exploring its culture cusine and people.

Day-1 (August 3, 2025; Sunday)

We fly from Frankfurt to Cochin (Kochi), on Sunday with Qatar Airways.
QR68 - Qatar Airways
17:15 Frankfurt Frankfurt International Airport (FRA)  ->  5h 55m Duration
                                                                                    00:10+1 Doha Hamad International Airport (DOH)
QR514 - Qatar Airways
01:45 Doha Hamad International Airport (DOH) ->  4h 30m Duration
                                                                                    08:45 Kochi Kochi International Airport (COK)
Day-2 (August 4, 2025; Monday)
We arrive in Cochin International Airport on , at 8:45 AM. 
We stay the night in Kochi, perhaps also expolre the Mattanchery old town.

Day-3(August 5, 2025; Tuesday)
We visit Kerala Folklore Museum and Kerala Kalamandalam
Day-4(August 6, 2025; Wednesday)
We travel to the nilgiri hills, on the eastern side of Kerala, by car.
We will chill this day in the resort, where we stay.
For the forthcoming days , we will eyplore, the Periyar Tiger Reserve.
Periyar Tiger Reserve -> Information PDF
Day-5 (August 7, 2025; Thursday)
Border Hiking
This is a day-long hiking programme within the Periyar Tiger Reserve. The undulating terrains and altitudinal hiking of 900 m to 1300 m will give you the glimpse of the lofty slopes bordering the region.
Gaur, sloth bear and elephants are often sighted apart from birds and butterflies from here.
This programme is open to a maximum of 10 tourists in 2 different groups. The trekkers along with two guides participate in the programme which starts at 08.00 hrs and ends in the evening.
The package includes food also.
Option 1: Throndiyar  ->  Link
Option 2: Brandipara  - > Link

Day-6 (August 8, 2025; Friday)
Border Hiking / Bamboo Rafting
Option -1: Full day Rafring - > Link
Option-2: Half dayRafting -> Link
Day-7 (August 9, 2025; Saturday)
Cinnamon Gardens Spice Plantation Visit or Munnar Tea Trail Tour
We spent the day relaxing, with some ayurvedic massages and swimming in the resort near the national park.
Day-8(August 10, 2025; Sunday)
We travel to Aleppey and spend a day in a houseboat. - > Link
We start at 11:30 AM and stay overnight in the boat.

Day-9(August 11, 2025; Monday)
We will explore the Spice trading hub in Aleppey. We drive back to Ernakulam/Kochi from Aleppey and return the car.
In the afternoon , we will board the train to Bangalore, from Ernakular South.
16:50 | ERNAKULAM JN -> 03:55 | SMVT BENGALURU
Day-10(August 12, 2025; Tuesday)
We take an Uber from Bangalore to Hampi.
Day-11(August 13, 2025; Wednesday)
We spent the day among the Ruins of Hampi.
Day-12(August 14, 2025; Thursday)
We do paragliding over the ruins of Hampi.
Day-13(August 15, 2025; Friday)
We spent the day among the Ruins of Hampi.
Day-14(August 16, 2025; Saturday)
We travel to Bangalore by train, from Hosapete. 
We explore the city of Bangalore.
Day-15(August 17, 2025)
We fly back to Frankfurt from Bangalore(Bengaluru) with  Lufthansa.
LH 755- Lufthansa
02:55 AM (Indian Time) Bangalore Internationaler Flughafen Kempegowda (BLR) Terminal 2  ->  9h 40min Duration
                                                                                    09:05 AM (German Time) Frankfurt Internationaler Flughafen Frankfurt (FRA) Terminal 1
